General.Name: Wesizwe
General.Description: Wesizwe Platinum Limited, through its subsidiaries, operates as a metals mining company in South Africa. The company primarily explores for platinum, palladium, rhodium, and gold deposits. Its flagship project is the Bakubung platinum mine located on the Western limb of the Bushveld Igneous Complex in the North West province of South Africa. Wesizwe Platinum Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
